import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { PhotoIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/solid"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import axios from "axios"; import { Formik } from "formik"; const Blog = () => { //user Information const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [lastname, setLastname] = useState(""); const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [imgUrl, setImgUrl] = useState(""); // updateUser const updateUser = (id) => { const data = { name: name, lastname: lastname, username: username, email: email, password: password, imgUrl: imgUrl, }; axios.put(`http://localhost:4000/order/${id}` , data) .then(res => console.log(res)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }; return ( {({ erros, touched, handleChange, handleBlur, isSubmitting }) => (
